databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID

SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID

SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG = 0) ORDER BY KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE

SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG = 0) ORDER BY KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE

SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER IS NULL) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE IS NULL) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG = 0) ORDER BY KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE

sql.name: GetRecordBy船ID予定データ_救命設備ID

databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER IS NULL) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE IS NULL) AND (KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG = 0)

SELECT KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TENKEN_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.ALARM_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_USER, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.BIKOU, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DELETE_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.SEND_FLAG, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.VESSEL_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.DATA_NO, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.USER_KEY, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_DATE, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_KYUMEISETUBI.TS,
MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_NAME FROM KS_KYUMEISETUBI LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_KYUMEISETUBI ON MS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = KS_KYUMEISETUBI.MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID
WHERE KS_KYUMEISETUBI.KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID

INSERT INTO KS_KYUMEISETUBI( KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, TENKEN_DATE, ALARM_DATE, JISEKITOUROKU_USER, JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, BIKOU, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :TENKEN_DATE, :ALARM_DATE, :JISEKITOUROKU_USER, :JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, :BIKOU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE KS_KYUMEISETUBI SET MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :MS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, TENKEN_DATE = :TENKEN_DATE, ALARM_DATE = :ALARM_DATE, JISEKITOUROKU_USER = :JISEKITOUROKU_USER, JISEKITOUROKU_DATE = :JISEKITOUROKU_DATE, BIKOU = :BIKOU, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID = :KS_KYUMEISETUBI_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
